messages.content: You are correct, this happens everytime to me
I always give my disclaimer when he asks for my phone number. I understand and respect my situation could be a deal breaker for some.
Eh. I think either works. But sure. Replies is probably more accurate
While I agree with you for the most part, I also have cats and upholstered furniture.
No. It’s slower and takes more calculation but it can be done. That’s why it should be practiced.
Agreed. There is r/clevercomebacks but this is just not even that.
So true! My brain always goes to these places when buying a car...
I'd trust someone who is bound by regulation over [NAME] from Essex who blames immigrants cos he was fired for sleeping on the job
agreed....seems that due to plot force shes starting to slip
I agree with you, I just don't believe it will happen.
I unironically agree with everything on the left side of this.
Ok, fair enough. From your original post, it wasn't really clear that you looked at sources other than YouTube.
Yes, that is exactly what happened.
It’s true. Icebergs can’t melt steel beams.
It's ok, it's just Gypsy Danger
Yeah thats exactly what I said. Im too weak to do it.
I agree with your guy. Sex can sometimes improve with the adulterous partner, because he/she feels desired and sexy again.
Thats....that's pretty normal...prolly somewhere in the ballpark of 280miles...If you dont have a fuel efficient car its not hard to do.
If you’re a solo player, then I understand...
100% correct. Seriously, listen to [NAME] talking points when she mentions Syria. Matches RT propaganda exactly.
Yes! These people are allowed to vote and drive and do other things that affect our lives!
If the fan doesn't work, then I'm fine with it.
Nah I think you're just feeling confident because you got a slamming deal on those clothes! I would feel the same way!
People say 'confidence is attractive' which is definitely true. That doesn't mean that being arrogant or pretending to be confident is attractive.
Right. The mantra at my school is that we don't give grades, kids earn them.
Yeah, sure, but it's beatable. It's made to be beaten, not otherwise. That's what I meant with my speech.
That would be okay, I guess.
